starbucks-clone.name: Starbucks clone
starbucks-clone.description: I created and Deployed A React.Js starbucks Clone with user sign in Functionality using Google Account and send realtime posts updates using firestore Database. Other Tools used includes React-Framer-motion Fade, Material-Ui etc.

airbnb.description:
